events.message: I just received my order, but the product is damaged with a large scratch on the surface, which is very disappointing.
The issue has been classified under Product Defect due to the customer reporting a damaged item with surface scratches.
This case has been assigned to Customer Support Agent Lisa Brown specializing in product quality issues.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear about the scratch on your product. I’m here to help resolve this issue.
Could you please provide a photo of the damaged product and your order number so that we can verify and proceed with the next steps?
Here are the photos showing the scratch clearly. My order number is 879654321. I hope this can be fixed quickly.
Thank you for the photos and order details. We can offer you a replacement product or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement, thanks. I appreciate the quick response and help with this issue.
Your replacement order has been processed and will ship within two business days. We will send a tracking number shortly.
Just checking in to ensure your replacement arrived in good condition and that you are satisfied with the resolution. Please let us know if further assistance is needed.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing your case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
